This is a Quarto website.

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
#| message: false
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)

# Load the CSV file into R
data <- read_csv("adult.csv")
```
```{r}

ggplot(data, aes(x = Bachelors, fill= income)) +
    geom_bar() +
    labs(title = "Income Levels by Education",
         x = "Education Level",
         y = "Count")
```
